sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ShieldCheck, TrendingUp, Calendar, Users, Target, Award, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, Clock, BarChart3, FileText, Star, Activity } from 'lucide-react'; const FoodSafetyPrograms = () => { const [selectedProgram, setSelectedProgram] = useState(null); const programs = [ { id: 1, name: 'HACCP Implementation', description: 'Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points program for food safety management', status: 'Active', participants: 156, completionRate: 78, startDate: '2024-01-01', endDate: '2024-12-31', budget: '₹5,00,000', spent: '₹3,20,000', coordinator: 'Dr. Rajesh Kumar', category: 'Training', priority: 'High', progress: 65 }, { id: 2, name: 'Food Handler Certification', description: 'Mandatory certification program for all food service workers', status: 'Active', participants: 342, completionRate: 92, startDate: '2023-06-01', endDate: '2024-06-01', budget: '₹8,50,000', spent: '₹7,80,000', coordinator: 'Priya Sharma', category: 'Certification', priority: 'High', progress: 88 }, { id: 3, name: 'Restaurant Hygiene Standards', description: 'Comprehensive hygiene and sanitation standards for restaurants', status: 'Active', participants: 89, completionRate: 67, startDate: '2024-02-15', endDate: '2024-08-15', budget: '₹3,75,000', spent: '₹1,95,000', coordinator: 'Amit Patel', category: 'Standards', priority: 'Medium', progress: 45 }, { id: 4, name: 'Cold Chain Management', description: 'Temperature control and cold storage management for perishable foods', status: 'Planning', participants: 0, completionRate: 0, startDate: '2024-04-01', endDate: '2024-10-01', budget: '₹6,25,000', spent: '₹0', coordinator: 'Sarah Johnson', category: 'Infrastructure', priority: 'Medium', progress: 15 } ]; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'Active': return 'badge-success'; case 'Planning': return 'badge-info'; case 'Completed': return 'badge-primary'; case 'On Hold': return 'badge-warning'; default: return 'badge-secondary'; } }; const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case 'High': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'Medium': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'Low': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const totalBudget = programs.reduce((sum, program) => sum + parseInt(program.budget.replace(/[₹,]/g, '')), 0); const totalSpent = programs.reduce((sum, program) => sum + parseInt(program.spent.replace(/[₹,]/g, '')), 0); const totalParticipants = programs.reduce((sum, program) => sum + program.participants, 0); return (
{/* Header */}

Food Safety Programs

Monitor and manage food safety training and certification programs

{/* Summary Stats */}

Total Programs

{programs.length}

Total Participants

{totalParticipants}

Budget Utilization

{Math.round((totalSpent / totalBudget) * 100)}%

Avg Completion

{Math.round(programs.reduce((sum, p) => sum + p.completionRate, 0) / programs.length)}%

{/* Programs Grid */}
{programs.map((program) => (

{program.name}

{program.description}

{program.status} {program.priority}
{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress {program.progress}%
{/* Program Details */}

{program.participants}

Participants

{program.completionRate}%

Completion

{/* Budget Information */}
Budget: {program.budget}
Spent: {program.spent}
Coordinator: {program.coordinator}
{/* Action Buttons */}
))}
{/* Recent Activities */}

Recent Program Activities

{[ { id: 1, activity: 'HACCP Implementation program milestone completed', program: 'HACCP Implementation', time: '2 hours ago', type: 'success' }, { id: 2, activity: 'New batch of 25 participants enrolled in Food Handler Certification', program: 'Food Handler Certification', time: '4 hours ago', type: 'info' }, { id: 3, activity: 'Restaurant Hygiene Standards program budget review scheduled', program: 'Restaurant Hygiene Standards', time: '1 day ago', type: 'warning' } ].map((activity) => (
{activity.type === 'success' ? : activity.type === 'info' ? : }

{activity.activity}

{activity.program} • {activity.time}

))}
); }; export default FoodSafetyPrograms;
